website_summaries.verdict: It's a good deal if you need an infant car seat, but it won't fit baby beyond 35 pounds.
pros: A sturdy yet lightweight model for babies up to 35 pounds
Sports a removable head support and rotating canopy
cons: Our testers found that it is challenging to install and remove

customer_reviews.title: Loved this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Loved this car seat. I ordered 2 of them for my twins and honestly has met my expectations. Easy to install, easy to clean and easy to assemble the straps while your baby is growing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacking some features
customer_reviews.text: This car seat has a low-quality head positioning pillow for infants, the shade interferes with the handle, and it lacks the covers that keep the shoulder straps from digging into a child's neck. I bought it during a sale, so it was very affordable. If I had paid regular price I'd be disappointed. It's made in China, if that matters to you. My Chicco infant seat cost significantly more, but it was a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I honestly just didn't like it. I'm glad I took it out and played with it around 34 weeks instead of 38 or something! My biggest complaint is that the buttons to move the handle is in the front of the car seat in the area of my thumb rather than the back like my older car seats. I found the thumb buttons to be somewhat difficult. The handle could not move back and forth without pushing the canopy up and down. It's almost like the two were connected to each other. We are returning and getting a different car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndle

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, already dont function
customer_reviews.text: we just got this seat for my newborn, hopeing getting a new chair will mean great quality and easy to use. couple of weeks into it and it was already hard to get the seat in and out from its base. even harder almost impossible when the baby is seating. it clicks in alright but getting the seat out is not working, frustrating when you load a baby in and out in the rain etc. it is also not light, its only 3-4o lighter than the regular chair i have. very disappointed with this purchase but with a baby i got too busy to try and return it on time
customer_reviews.author: iris

customer_reviews.title: It seems pretty dangerous. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised to have had so much trouble with a graco seat. Straps are a constant nightmare. They always fold at the top of the straps and make it extremely difficult to fully secure baby in the harness. Someone who isn't as adamant about car seat safety may not realize how much this prohibits the harness from properly tightening. It seems pretty dangerous. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Better options available elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Horrible car seat to be honest. Terrible head support, so cramped, doesnt fit snug, doesnt connect with the aire3 stroller in one try(manual says its not compatible but I can see the stroller and seat sold together many places) and lastly the level indicator started rattling after 3-4 months use. I wouldnt buy this again and will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alka anand

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Function Well
customer_reviews.text: Fabric covering on the car seat does not fit snugly and the canopy is too large. The handle does not adjust easily because the covering and the canopy are in the way. The canopy had to be removed for us to be able to even adjust the handle. We are returning the item and have found a different lightweight car seat that functions much better.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Just one thing
customer_reviews.text: I just received our car seat. The only thing I'm not liking is that the clicks for the handle to move are towards you. I didn't realize it in the picture until I had it here to try. It may not be a problem for others but I just don't like the way it feels on my hands, especially if we are having to do that a few times a day. I'm debating on exchanging it, but we'll see. Still a great car seat though.
customer_reviews.author: Mom status

customer_reviews.title: Good solid pick for a basic infant seat
customer_reviews.text: I love the click connect system. This car seat is lightweight, which is perfect as I recover from a c-section. I originally chose this because I knew it would fit into my stroller, but I haven’t used them together yet. Pros: lightweight, stylish black and grey, compatible with click connect, not too bulky, cute bonnet, easy to install, secure. Cons: Not much padding for infant (although my two month old sleeps soundly in it), and only good for small babies anyway which means it won’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cate

customer_reviews.title: I had the same exact car seat with my first ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the same exact car seat with my first daughter about 4 years ago, bought this for my second and WOW did Graco keep cheap making this seat. The actual seat part is an uncomfortable material for baby and the canopy is very hard to move back and forth and doesn’t even cover very far making the sun always in baby’s eyes. Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Nichols

customer_reviews.title: I love how light these car seats are
customer_reviews.text: I love how light these car seats are. We first got baby trend car seats which weigh twice as much and weren't realistic since we have twins and carry 2 car seats. Its so much easier to buckle the kiddos into these. Each half of the lower buckle clicks in separately- on the baby trend you have to line up the 2 pieces and hold them together to buckle. We also got the matching side by side double stroller and love the whole setup.
customer_reviews.author: GR8T Electronics

customer_reviews.title: This is the best car seat I have ever seen in my life.
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine there is a better car seat out there. This Graco is strong and durable. It has some weight but you know your baby is safe inside. I love everything about it. How simply it locks into the base in our car is more than I could have expected. It is so simple to get in and out of the vehicle. It is the perfect car seat and baby carrier. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnston

customer_reviews.title: 99 percent great
customer_reviews.text: Great carseat. I just wish the canopy was free moving. The way it's connected makes it difficult to use. I don't use it very often, but wish I could. It seems a silly thing, buy it makes a big difference! Also, I know they say it "doesn't work" with older model stroller systems, but it works with my old stroller just fine. Clicks in and everything.
customer_reviews.author: ilovepopcornyum

customer_reviews.title: Got this for a great deal. Our old Graco expired so for baby ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a great deal. Our old Graco expired so for baby #4 we needed a new seat. I love the gender neutral color, and and black hides any dirt well. Ours seems a little trick to pop out of the base, but that could just be the angle I’m pulling it out at. This also doesn’t snap into our old Graco stroller: but I would definitely buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straps are too short for bigger babies !
customer_reviews.text: My son is only 6 months old at 22lb. The seat looks just right for his size now, but he got two red seat belt marks on his chest after 2 hours of use at the mall. The length of the strap are not extendable, so I really don't see how this can fit to a 35 lb baby.
customer_reviews.author: Te-Ming Yeh Chuang

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is ridiculously heavy, but I'm guessing that's because it's built sturdier/safer than some of the lighter options. It does click into place really easily (I recommend jiggling it a few times to make sure both sides have clicked in) and it works great with my Graco Click Connect jogging stroller. It seems comfortable for the baby and the straps are pretty easy to adjust. I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Made it easy to tote around a newborn! Felt safe and secure with her in it.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Dawn Lawmaster

customer_reviews.title: Warning labels are very apparent
customer_reviews.text: Personally I like the car seat. Its not too bad. I bought it for the cover to keep my baby warm and it was a great investment. However, the warning labels are right by the head rest on both sides. I don't care but the picture is misleading. Other wise great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Loved this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grand baby and it was perfect to use while he needed this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Howard

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this, buy it is very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this, buy it is very heavy. wonder if the weight would help make it safer in an accident. So far this has been a high quality seat. I like the easy to re-tract straps.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: I love gracco baby things
customer_reviews.text: To be expected!!! I love gracco baby things. I had one before for my 1st and went to my other 3. Clicks when you put it in so you know it’s secure. It’s soft and fits baby well. You can’t go wrong with this. It’s also a good price
customer_reviews.author: melissa edri

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friends baby shower. Overall it looks to be very well made. The installation was a breeze, it’s very easy to take apart to clean. Overall my friend is very pleased with the seat
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Burton

customer_reviews.title: The car seat is perfect!! It's a little darker than the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: This came earlier than expected (but completely appreciated!). The car seat was already assembled which I wasn't expecting... however it's been 9 years since I've had to buy one of these, so maybe that is standard. The car seat is perfect!! It's a little darker than the picture made it seem (the white is more like a very light beige) but that isn't a problem at all, just something I noticed. It's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t be more happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this car seat with the matching double stroller. I couldn’t be more happier with this purchase! The car seat is super light which is makes it easier to carry with baby in it. Adjusting the belts when baby gets bigger, is very simple as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Great value compared to some of the higher end car ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value compared to some of the higher end car seats out there. There doesn't seem to be much difference in terms of quality between this seat and something that costs over $300.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin T.Top Contributor: Snowboarding

customer_reviews.title: Good seat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good seat for the price. The canopy and handle do get in the way of each other when all the way up. The head support isn't very cushy, but I got what I was expecting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ila Renken

customer_reviews.title: Cover Material is Cheap-ish
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the material for the actual cover is a little cheap but otherwise I've been really happy with the car seat. It's easy to use and we have zero complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: ARRE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My daughter loves it. Be warned, the head padding is flimsy. You should purchase a "snuzzler" for your new born. Nevertheless, I purchased this with a free gift card, as an open box (2-3x cheaper). It arrived in a mangled box, but the product was new, as pictured, with all original materials. So I am very happy and my daughter is ecstatic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice infant car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice infant car seat. We purchased it for our new granddaughter and her parents are very happy with it. Holds her secure and she seems happy and comfortable in it. Provides a snug ride......hence the name I guess. Easy to secure to the seat also. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: CW in CO

customer_reviews.title: No head support
customer_reviews.text: The infant head rest gives zero support. Had to purchase a cushion for my baby's head additionally. The buckles are kind of hard to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: clayton swann

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice product, lighweight.
customer_reviews.text: The babies did not care for the boot but it was a nice option. The fabric cleans up easily, though it might make them sweat in the summer. The straps seem to tangle a bit more than our previous one, but its not unbearable. Overall very happy with this purchase of two for our twins.
customer_reviews.author: JstaGAgirl

customer_reviews.title: its perfect in every other way
customer_reviews.text: the head rest could be more supportive, However, its perfect in every other way. it feels secure but not too heavy, its the perfect car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We use it for our youngest son and it’s very easy to use. I voted a 3 on easy to clean cause I haven’t tried to clean it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for our old car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for our old car seat. Only downside is the black can get pretty hot when sitting in the car and the baby doesn't like it, esp if you're just getting into the car. We cover it with a blanket when we know it'll be sitting in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Light and great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! It is light and super easy to installed. The straps are comfortable on newborns. I can put my daughter in it asleep and she won't wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful with the graco click connect system
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter than my previous infant car seat, and yet it doesn't sacrifice any safety features. Works wonderful with the graco click connect system!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C

customer_reviews.title: Love this neutral color. Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to hold, more than other kinds I've tried. It's easy to adjust and my baby seems comfortable. One con: The part that covers the baby's feet only attaches with little cardboard tabs so I think it may not last long :(
customer_reviews.author: Grace Given

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was very easy to install and care for. Fits my son very well and keeps him comfy.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA LANE

customer_reviews.title: Saved money and my back! 7.5lb seat
customer_reviews.text: Missing the instruction booklet. While findable online it would have been nice to have in the box. Everything else great.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaGratto

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product for the price, I don't like where the latch releases to remove it from the base, but it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Jacob Davey

customer_reviews.title: easy adjusting to fit 6lb baby
customer_reviews.text: very light. easy adjusting to fit 6lb baby . really like the base that clicks on
customer_reviews.author: it's me

customer_reviews.title: The best carseat i have had.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It is super easy to load and unload from my wifes tiny car to my truck that sits a lot higher. The cover for the lower half of the carseat is amazing. It keeps blankets from being kicked off and protects from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seats
customer_reviews.text: These car seats have been great for my daughters twins. They go hand in hand with the Baby Trend universal Double Snap-N-Go Stroller Frame. The base has the clips to attach to the seat and can be moved to a different car rather easily.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat i received it super fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat i received it super fast! I highly recommend this car seat, It's just like in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great child seat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great child seat for the money. There really are no complaints. Easily snaps into the base, and just as easy to pull out. Tightening and loosening the harness straps are a breeze. Graco knows how to make them.
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very fast in great condition. looks like a great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast in great condition. looks like a great car seat. I’m very excited to bring my little one home in it.
customer_reviews.author: Keturah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: Solid car seat. Arrived in perfect condition, and looks very sleek in black.
customer_reviews.author: JulieAngelaDarling

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Very light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Angela E Brown

customer_reviews.title: I like the way my baby fits in the seat
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my baby fits in the seat. Head support is horrible, so be prepared to buy a better head support. It also gets stuck in the base when trying to remove it, it took 2 weeks before I figured out the trick to remove it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter, and my son stated he likes it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for me, Nana, and one for my daughter, the Mommy. Just as good as the expensive ones. Love the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very light works with graco accessories
customer_reviews.text: Very light. The nice removable leg cover keeps him warm. Got it for my fourth child. Good amount of padding is I am sure comfortable for him as well, he does not complain when put in for a trip and little fussing while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Harley McDaniel III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the car seat! Excellent buy fast shipping. Serves its purpose safe secure and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used this yet but I love the grub handle bar and that the cover goes ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet but I love the grub handle bar and that the cover goes under and not over the handle!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Click connect and tightening straps are great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take in and out. Bulky and hard to walk around carrying. Wish there were better instructions for taking off the fabric to wash after baby threw up in it.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha_helms

customer_reviews.title: Canopy makes moving carry handle difficult.
customer_reviews.text: love the car seat. good quality. only complaint is the canopy makes it very hard to raise and lower the handle. once you have both hands squeezing the release mechanisms on either side of seat you need a 3rd hand to push canopy down/in to allow the handle to pass it. I switched to this with my second child from a Britax Chaperone. It is much lighter and easier to carry which is the reason I switched. So over all I am pleased, but I will be removing the Canopy to keep from fighting with it.
customer_reviews.author: TNmom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, best price
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good weight, would highly recommend and Amazon price is better than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Princess

customer_reviews.title: I don't have much problems with the straps getting all twisted which is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Buckles and adjusts simply enough. The only thing is I wish the visor was more adjustable. Sometimes the click connects sticks. I don't have much problems with the straps getting all twisted which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Great Graco seat!
customer_reviews.text: I feel very safe with my baby in this car seat. Good weight range. The little cover is super helpful in the winter with tiny babies.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat because it comes with the piece for the winter when its cold , the only thing i did replace was the infant insert because i felt like it was kind of cheap looking and would rip or dirty easy so i bought a jj cole insert . Other then that i would highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product.. the hood is not staying up.. it keeps falling backwards- very annoying. The handle is uncomfortable.. it feels like it should open more in front
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: and it was in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: It was an open box item, and it was in perfect condition!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley  Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Easy to install, and easy to insert and remove. When your baby grows, you will need to adjust the straps. Just flip over the carseat, unhook the straps, and place them in the next slot up.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The straps that connect the base to the car are ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps that connect the base to the car are hard work to get in and out. If you need to change the base between cars frequently this will be really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice car seat for my 3rd baby but it's not compatible with any of the old graco strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: Good price, lightweight, very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was between this and chicco. Better price and great buy considering this is my last baby. Car seat base $35 beats the chicco base for nearly $80. I get two bases for price of one. I bought the bundle that comes with the stroller as well. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Mingura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, lightweight, and my newborn seems very comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Damn good deal for the price I bought it at. Good product. Five starts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seats
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used my car seats yet, the babies are due in a week, but they look sturdy and awesome, and from experience Graco products come highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Drayton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying from the open box section and the carseat is in perfect condition. It is as if we purchased it brand new. Perfect fit for our 6 week old! The material is easy to clean, which is a plus for us!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great the it is versatile!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a seat with same base as my son and daughter-in-law. The seat is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... is a little hard for a new baby but great price.
customer_reviews.text: Material is a little hard for a new baby but great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Car seat is perfect for the little one.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grand daughter... This is a perfect car seat.
customer_reviews.author: PTLegeend811

customer_reviews.title: Love the car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love the car seat. Down side for me is my vehicle has the seat belt airbags, so i can only use the latch system.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust straps
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat. The straps are so much easier to adjust than our last car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this infant car seat! It connects to the double stroller, has additional bases for purchase, and comes from a very reputable car seat maker so I felt super good about the purchase. Also, the price certainly doesn't suck. The little cover over the bottom half is super nice. It'll keep my little guy dry and/or warm without having to purchase an additional item. This car seat is also fairly lightweight. I was able to lift it (base and all) with my 24lb toddler inside without my arm breaking off, pretty happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavier than expected but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light weight carseat that clicks into all Grace produces.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Better than the classic connect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Better than the classic connect. I use them on the Baby Jogger double stroller and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty heavy. Even without my baby.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for us and looks nice in the matching graco stroller we bought. But it was a bit on the heavy side and hard for me to carry by myself when my son was a month old.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Heredero

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this car seat! It is much lighter than our 2014 Britax car seat, which we loved. Our baby has not yet used the car seat as we are still waiting on his arrival. But overall the quality seems appropriate for the price and the installation of the base was pretty easy. Even with the LATCH system not being the most sophisticated(you have to manually press the latch to unhook it). This car seat is also compatible with our Baby Jogger City Select with an adapter so it works perfectly for us!
customer_reviews.author: The Miles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought at a discount through Amazon Warehouse Deals. We are thrilled to have gotten it at such a reduced price and it two days. Although the outside box was a bit damaged (as advertised), the car seat is perfect! It will work with the car bases that we already have as well as our stroller. I will definitely buy from Amazon Warehouse Deals again!
customer_reviews.author: Chez_chloe236

customer_reviews.title: We haven't used it yet but it is much lighter ...
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet but it is much lighter than our other seat and fits perfectly on our click connect stroller. We can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: No head/neck support
customer_reviews.text: There's not as much head support as the previous versions/models of this. The padding that surrounds the head is really flimsy and basically lays flat. Not sure if this will cut it for us; it may be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter because my other daughter had one and highly recommended it. It had been awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter because my other daughter had one and highly recommended it. It had been awesome! Very easy to get in and out of the car also works Bey eel with the quick connect stroller. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donna R. Searle

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line!
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 1 year old and he still fits in this car seat and its been great! Very durable and easy to disassemble and clean. I would recommend this seat to anyone looking for a safe and affordable seat. Buy one you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. You can get better ones with the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really love it - it's affordable
customer_reviews.text: Really love it - it's affordable, and very practical. Is great quality and when my babies in it, it gets its best sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Avromi C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is 4.5 months old and we love this car seat. Very easy to install and easy to take in and out of the car! My son falls asleep every time, so it must be comfortable! Awkward to carry, but they all are. This is one of the lightest car seats I can find. I can't imagine getting one heavier, babies grow so fast!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and love the bottom cover for extra protection from weather for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Felina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: The easiest car seat I have ever dealt with. It easily clicks on and our of base to take baby in and out of car. Love that it is gender neutral and not busy with color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Holt

customer_reviews.title: this one works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Don I what to look for in a car seat carrier, this one works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tian S.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic, with multiple engineering oversights. the latch system buckle is torqued against the plastic slot/hole it goes through when pulled tightly...this in turn is causing the base to warp at that point of contact. The canopy is nearly impossible to deal with w/o losing your sanity. The boot that comes with model we ordered, slightly adds length against the backseat, creating a situation that makes it hard to enter base. Multiple "clicks" required to ensure it is secure.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like in the picture, love how its both roomy and cozy. I haven't used it yet but looking forward to carrying out little one in it ebb he arrives in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Britni Sandy Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had the clips underneath to attach to grocery carts. Didn't think of that when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it tbh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem comfortable for my baby at all no padding or cushion at all
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carseat!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping on this along with my jogger stroller only took 5 days. Superb! Great carseat too!
customer_reviews.author: Christine SanEvans

customer_reviews.title: it was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift. They seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken & Lori Hodges

customer_reviews.title: So hard to tighten straps!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first, but now it’s SO hard to tighten the straps. It’s terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat! Reasonable price and the colors of this one hide messes and are gender neutral, yet stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Phillips

product_meta.title: Graco SnugRide 35 Infant Car Seat, Pierce
product_meta.description: The SnugRide Click Connect 35 infant car seat is designed to protect babies rear-facing from 4-35 lbs and features a comfortable seat to keep baby safe and cozy. SnugRide Click Connect 35 is equipped with Click Connect technology providing a one-step secure attachment to all Graco Click Connect strollers making it easy to create a travel system that best fits your lifestyle.
feature_bullets: Ultra-lightweight infant car seat is easy to transport from the car to the stroller and everywhere in between
Rear-facing car seat helps protect infants from 4 - 35 pounds; and up to 32", making it an excellent first car seat for baby
Click Connect system provides a one-step secure attachment between the rear facing car seat to all Graco Click Connect Strollers to create a travel system
These Graco infant car seats are rigorously crash tested to meet or exceed US safety standards and reassure safety-conscious parents
SafeSeat Engineered and crash tested to meet or exceed US standard FMVSS 213. Car seat width inside 11.75 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars277 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
